name: Detect Magic:
description: Detects spells and magic items within 60 ft.

name: Detect Poison:
description: Detects poison in one creature or small object.

name: Daze:
description: Humanoid creature of 4 HD or less loses next action.

name: Flare:
description: Dazzles one creature (–1 on attack rolls).

name: Mending:
description: Makes minor repairs on an object.

name: Open/Close:
description: Opens or closes small or light things.

name: Arcane Mark:
description: Inscribes a personal rune (visible or invisible).

name: Repair Minor Damage:
description: “Cures” 1 point of damage to a construct.
